title: Microsoft | L61 | Hyderabad
content:
Education: B.Tech - IIT (Chemical Engineering)
Years of Experience: 2.25
Prior Experience: Indian Startup
Date of the Offer: November 2022
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE-2 (L61)
Location: Hyderabad, India
Salary: INR 3100000
Relocation: INR 300000 + INR 122000
Signing Bonus: INR 200000 (1st Year) + INR 100000 (2nd Year)
Stock bonus: USD 50000 (Vested Over 4 Years - 25% X 4)
Performance Bonus: 0% - 20% of Base Salary 
Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~INR 4800000 (First Year)
Benefits: Standard Microsoft Benefits

salaryTotal: : ~59 Lpa For The 1st Year, ~52 2nd Year Onwards

title: Adobe | CS-1 | Bangalore
content:
Education: BE from Tier 3
Years of Experience: 7
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at Myntra
Date of the Offer: Verbal Offer on Sept 2023
Company: Adobe
Title/Level: Computer Scientist
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 36 LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: ~2L
Stock bonus: 20L (vested over the period of 4 years)
Bonus: 15% of base
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 36+5.4+5 = 46.5L
Previous Total Compensation (Salary + Bonus + Stock) : 30.5 + 1.5 + 8 = 40L
Benefits: Standard Adobe Banifits (which they think are top notch)
Other details: I decliened the offer as Initially I asked 45 base already they negotiated to 40 thn they came up with this offer which is serious lowball for me, also to lowball they told as per interview we are giving this but I knew my interview was great bcz interviewer himself told me. HR also told me not to apply in future if I am looking for higher base component :P
